parameter.name: bugId
parameter.description: ID of the bug.

parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: Array of the ids or aliases of the bugs.

parameter.name: minorUpdate
parameter.description: If set to true, this is considered a minor update and no mail is sent to users who do not want minor update emails.

parameter.name: alias
parameter.description: Aliases of a bug that can be used instead of a bug number.

parameter.name: assignedTo
parameter.description: The full login name of the user to assigned bug.

parameter.name: blocks
parameter.description: specify the bugs that this bug blocks, respectively.

parameter.name: dependsOn
parameter.description: Specify the bugs that is depends on, respectively.

parameter.name: cc
parameter.description: The users on the cc list.

parameter.name: isCcAccessible
parameter.description: Whether or not users in the CC list are allowed to access the bug

parameter.name: comment
parameter.description: A comment on the change.

parameter.name: isCommentPrivate
parameter.description: This is how update the privacy of comments that are already on a bug.

parameter.name: component
parameter.description: The Component the bug is in.

parameter.name: deadline
parameter.description: The Deadline field a date specifying when the bug must be completed by, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameter.name: dupeOf
parameter.description: The bug that this bug is a duplicate of.

parameter.name: estimatedTime
parameter.description: The total estimate of time required to fix the bug, in hours.

parameter.name: flags
parameter.description: An array of hashes with changes to the flags.

parameter.name: groups
parameter.description: The groups a bug is in.

parameter.name: keywords
parameter.description: Keywords on the bug.

parameter.name: opSys
parameter.description: The Operating System field on the bug.

parameter.name: platform
parameter.description: The Platform or Hardware field on the bug.

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: The Priority field on the bug.

parameter.name: product
parameter.description: The name of the product that the bug is in.

parameter.name: qaContact
parameter.description: The full login name of the bug's QA Contact.

parameter.name: isCreatorAccessible
parameter.description: Whether or not the bug's reporter is allowed to access the bug.

parameter.name: remainingTime
parameter.description: How much work time is remaining to fix the bug.

parameter.name: resetAssignedTo
parameter.description: If true, the assigned_to field will be reset to the default for the component that the bug is in.

parameter.name: resetQaContact
parameter.description: If true, the qa_contact field will be reset to the default for the component that the bug is in.

parameter.name: resolution
parameter.description: The current resolution.

parameter.name: seeAlso
parameter.description: The See Also field on a bug, specifying URLs to bugs in other bug trackers.

parameter.name: severity
parameter.description: The Severity field of a bug.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status want to change the bug to.

parameter.name: summary
parameter.description: The Summary field of the bug.

parameter.name: targetMilestone
parameter.description: The bug's Target Milestone.

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: The URL of the bug.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: The bug's Version.

parameter.name: whiteboard
parameter.description: The Status Whiteboard field of a bug.

parameter.name: workTime
parameter.description: The number of hours worked on this bug as part of this change.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: An object of the custom fields with the custom field name and the value.
